spell_tooltip.description: Primordial Wave summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 46 yards by 15% for 15 sec.
Summons a totem with 4% of your health at the target location for 6 sec that forms a circuit of electricity that enemies cannot pass through.

Your Heroism spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 141,346 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,683 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 75,345 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 73,781 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 136,776 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Chills the target with frost, causing 82,426 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Frost Shock snares its targets by an additional 10% and its duration is increased by 2 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 11,990 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 279,261 every 5 sec for 30 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 30% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 25,310 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 148,885 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.
Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash have a 100% chance to discharge electricity at your target, dealing 49,386 Nature damage.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 91,717 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 171,112 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 51,807 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.

Tempest, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a high chance to make your next Flame Shock become Voltaic Blaze.

Voltaic Blaze
Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 504,990 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 647,169 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 263,281 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 10%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 50% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 15% for 8 sec.

20% chance to refund Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent on Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 111,330 Flamestrike, 110,386 Froststrike, 110,346 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Increases the damage of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 20%, and reduces the cooldown of Ascendance by 60 sec.

While Ascendance is active, Windstrike automatically consumes up to 5 Maelstrom Weapon stacks to discharge a Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning at 100% effectiveness at your enemy, whichever you most recently used.
Every 40 Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 10%.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Tempest, Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Stormstrike, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 196,052 Nature damage. Every 4 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 142,225 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,460 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 73,002 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 73,893 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 279,261 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 632,383 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 264,263 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Your damaging abilities have a 6% chance to summon a Feral Spirit for 8 sec.

Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 173,181 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 52,551 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.

Tempest, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a high chance to make your next Flame Shock become Voltaic Blaze.

Voltaic Blaze
Instantly shocks the target and 5 nearby enemies with blazing thunder, causing 489,031 Nature damage and applying Flame Shock.

Generates 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Each target hit by Crash Lightning increases the damage of your next Stormstrike by 25%, up to a maximum of 6 stacks.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 635,839 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 264,157 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 10%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 50% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 15% for 8 sec.

20% chance to refund Maelstrom Weapon stacks spent on Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 111,541 Flamestrike, 112,020 Froststrike, 110,798 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Increases the damage of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 20%, and reduces the cooldown of Ascendance by 60 sec.

While Ascendance is active, Windstrike automatically consumes up to 5 Maelstrom Weapon stacks to discharge a Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning at 100% effectiveness at your enemy, whichever you most recently used.

Spending Maelstrom Weapon stacks grants you 1% haste for 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.
Tempest increases your movement speed by 20% for 5 sec.
Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning have a 35% chance to refund 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.

Tempest causes your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt to be instant cast, deal 40% increased damage, and cast an additional time.

Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Tempest summons a Nature Feral Spirit for 15 sec.
Crash Lightning and Chain Lightning damage increased by 10%.

Gain the effects of the Lightning Rod talent:

 Lightning Rod
Tempest, Lightning Bolt, Elemental Blast, Primordial Wave and Chain Lightning make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec.
 
Lightning Rods take 8% of all damage you deal with Tempest, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning.
Lightning Shield reduces the damage you take by 3%.
Stormstrike, Lightning Bolt, and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 194,189 Nature damage. Every 4 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 137,587 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 140,259 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 142,520 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 73,800 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 74,195 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 72,946 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 134,811 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 11,908 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 2.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 279,261 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 406,579 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 230,392 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 20 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning by 10%.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

Flame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Lightning Bolt or Tempest: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Lava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 10 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Imbue your shield with the element of Lightning for 1 hour, giving Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning a chance to call down 2 Thunderstrikes on your target for 56,573 Nature damage.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 24,682 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 10 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 647,764 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.

Increases the duration of Flame Shock by 6 sec and its damage by 50%.

Lava Burst consumes up to 3 sec of Flame Shock, instantly dealing that damage. Lava Burst overloads benefit at 50% effectiveness.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 8.0 sec.

Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 10 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt, Tempest, or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Imbue your shield with the element of Lightning for 1 hour, giving Lightning Bolt, Tempest, and Chain Lightning a chance to call down 2 Thunderstrikes on your target for 56,573 Nature damage.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 24,568 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 10 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 637,063 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.

Increases the duration of Flame Shock by 6 sec and its damage by 50%.

Lava Burst consumes up to 3 sec of Flame Shock, instantly dealing that damage. Lava Burst overloads benefit at 50% effectiveness.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 8.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 268,263 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

While Ascendance is active, generate 2 Maelstrom Weapon stacks every 1 sec.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 79,150 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 9 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.8 sec for 6 sec, dealing 38,987 Fire damage to all enemies within 9 yards.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.
Ancestors last an additional 4 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Riptide by 2 sec.

Increases your maximum mana by 5%.

Tidal Waves can now stack up to 4 times.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.
Increases the healing done by Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Wellspring, Downpour, and Chain Heal by 15%.

When an Ancestor departs, they cast Hydrobubble on a nearby injured ally.

 Hydrobubble
Surrounds your target in a protective water bubble for 10 sec.

The shield absorbs the next 488,707 incoming damage, but the absorb amount decays fully over its duration.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
